QuestData.Title: Herbal Remedies
QuestData.Description: Kang's remedy isn't working.$b$bThere is something else at work here. A power deep beneath the soil. It is sapping us of hope, hitting us with depression and despair.$b$bKang tells me this land has lotus plants. I might be able to make a tea that would hopefully lend Leza some strength.$b$bPlease, $p, search the ruins south and west of here for lotus leaves. I will pay you for your efforts.
